name: SentinelOne_DeepVisibility_DNSQuery
author: Joe Vasquez
description: Query Sentinel One Deep Visibility API v2.1 for hosts that have requested DNS lookups for a domain/URL/FQDN.

configurationItems.name: s1_api_key
configurationItems.description: API Key, don't forget this will expire!

configurationItems.name: hours_ago
configurationItems.description: Number of hours ago for the fromDate of the query.  ToDate will be now. Default is 12.
